text: Competition limited to EAGLE BOA holders under NAICS 561210 by the RFP close date.
snippet: This requirement will be competed among Offerors holding an EAGLE Program BOA under NAICS 561210 by the closing date of this RFP. Transportation is excluded.
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.15 - Eligibility verification checklist

text: Incumbent is KBRwyle under contract W52P1J-12-G-0061-0001.
snippet: The incumbent contractor is KBRwyle Technology Solutions, LLC under contract W52P1J-12-G-0061-0001.
shipley_reference: Capture Guide p.35 - Competitive intelligence gathering

text: Questions due 2025-10-14 1400 EST; proposals due 2025-10-28 1400 EST.
snippet: Questions must be received no later than 14 October 2025 at 1400 EST. Proposals are due 28 October 2025 at 1400 EST.
sub_factors: Late submissions may not be accepted
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.25 - Schedule management critical path

text: Technical Volume limited to 25 pages, 11 pt font, 1 inch margins; PDF only.
snippet: The Technical Volume shall not exceed twenty-five (25) pages. Minimum 11 point font with one-inch margins. Submit as a single PDF.
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.45 - Format compliance checklist

text: Offer shall remain valid for 180 days from proposal due date.
snippet: Offerors agree that proposals are valid for one hundred and eighty (180) calendar days from the due date.
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.30 - Contractual commitments tracking

text: Best Value tradeoff among Technical, Past Performance, and Cost/Price.
snippet: The Government intends to award a single contract using a Best Value Tradeoff considering Technical, Past Performance, and Cost/Price.
sub_factors: Technical more important than Past Performance
Combined non-price significantly more important than Price
shipley_reference: Capture Guide p.25 - Source selection strategy analysis

text: Technical Factor sub-factors: Staffing Approach, Maintenance Execution, Supply Chain Resilience.
snippet: Technical Factor consists of three sub-factors: (1) Staffing Approach, (2) Maintenance Execution, (3) Supply Chain Resilience.
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.50 - Technical factor decomposition matrix

text: Government Furnished Facilities and Equipment (GFFE) provided per PWS tasks.
snippet: Government Furnished Facilities and Equipment are listed in Attachment 0014 and associated with PWS task execution.
sub_factors: Offeror must integrate GFFE into maintenance plan
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.65 - Government furnished property management

text: Provide preventive maintenance for APS-4 equipment within 24 hours of notification.
snippet: The Contractor shall perform preventive maintenance on APS-4 designated equipment within 24 hours of Government notification.
sub_factors: 24 hour response clock starts upon Government email acknowledgment
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.55 - Performance standard tracking matrix

text: CLIN 0001: Firm-Fixed-Price base operations support for a 366-day base period including 60-day transition.
snippet: CLIN 0001 – Firm Fixed Price Base Operations Support – Base Period 366 days (includes 60 day transition).
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.40 - Contract structure and pricing strategy

text: Key Personnel changes prohibited first 180 days without CO approval.
snippet: Key Personnel substitutions are not permitted within the first 180 days absent written Contracting Officer approval.
shipley_reference: Proposal Guide p.35 - Key personnel commitment tracking
